mapper.insert: insert into board(user_id, title, content, type, count) values(#{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardType}, #{boardCount})
mapper.select: select a.board_id as boardId, a.user_id as userId, b.nickname as userName, a.title as boardTitle, a.content as boardContent, a.type as boardType, a.created as boardCreated, a.count as boardCount, a.modified as boardModified, if(a.user_id = #{userId}, 'Y', 'N') as isMine from board a left outer join user b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.board_id = #{bid} and a.flag = 'Y'

select a.board_id as boardId, a.user_id as userId, b.nickname as userName, a.title as boardTitle, a.content as boardContent, a.type as boardType, a.created as boardCreated, a.count as boardCount, a.modified as boardModified from board a left outer join user b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.type = #{type} and a.flag = 'Y' order by a.board_id desc limit #{startPage} , #{itemsperpage};
